channel.title: NPC Errors [PI]
channel.description:
Hey, so the problem is when I need monster spawns I copy them from another CFG and paste them in mine and they are exactly the same format. It also happens if I use the ::npc command sometimes. But when I try run the server it logs me in and continues spamming my CMD with this: [QUOTE][21/04/13 20:49]: [REGISTERED]: Predator [21/04/13 20:49]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBound***ception: 75 [21/04/13 20:49]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.updateNPC(PlayerHa ndler.java:277) [21/04/13 20:49]: at server.model.players.Client.initialize(Client.java:43 6) [21/04/13 20:49]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:202) [21/04/13 20:49]: at server.Server$2.execute(Server.java:147) [21/04/13 20:49]: at server.GameEngine$1.run(GameEngine.java:104) [21/04/13 20:49]: at server.GameEngine$5.run(GameEngine.java:177) [21/04/13 20:49]: at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(U nknown Source) [21/04/13 20:49]: at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) [21/04/13 20:49]: at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) [21/04/13 20:49]: at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$Sche duledFutureTask.access$201(Unknown Source) [21/04/13 20:49]: at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$Sche duledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) [21/04/13 20:49]: at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unk nown Source) [21/04/13 20:49]: at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Un known Source) [21/04/13 20:49]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/QUOTE] Help please? Thanks, RS PS I also get an error in the client. [code=text]Error: Predator size mismatch in getnpcpos - pos:1 psize:0 Error: T2 - 65,81,126 - 0,3251,3285 - Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 8,3251,3285 - 50,48,47,57,57,10,87,101,[/code] This is what my spawn-config.cfg looks like http://pastebin.com/NhhSQbrr This is what I try pasting or even when I add manually by typing.
spawn = 1677 3565 9948 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3565 9951 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1678 3569 9954 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3573 9959 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3566 9960 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1677 3562 9963 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3557 9961 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1678 3551 9959 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3552 9954 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1678 3546 9959 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3529 9969 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1677 3525 9962 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3548 9950 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1678 3552 9937 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3550 9939 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1678 3557 9929 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1677 3554 9924 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1677 3538 9930 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1678 3526 9934 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3506 9925 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3493 9925 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1678 3499 9939 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3492 9946 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1677 3487 9951 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3486 9943 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3479 9943 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1677 3473 9944 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1676 3473 9935 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1678 3486 9928 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment spawn = 1678 3557 9947 0 1 8 25 100 1 Experiment

item.title: NPC Errors [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

w00t, made a new spawn-config and organized it and fixed all the spawns and made sure they were all tabs. Fixed it

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Errors [PI]
item.dc:creator: @1_2_3_4_KOED 1 2 3 4 KOED
item.description:
@1_2_3_4_KOED wrote:

You obviously used one too many, or you used a space somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Errors [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

Pkor159:

In .cfg files you need to use button, not spaces. Maybe that’s what you did wrong?

I am using tabs.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Errors [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Pkor159 Pkor159
item.description:
@Pkor159 wrote:

In .cfg files you need to use button, not spaces. Maybe that’s what you did wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Errors [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

Hey, so the problem is when I need monster spawns I copy them from another CFG and paste them in mine and they are exactly the same format. It also happens if I use the ::npc command sometimes.

But when I try run the server it logs me in and continues spamming my CMD with this:

[QUOTE][21/04/13 20:49]: [REGISTERED]: Predator
[21/04/13 20:49]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBound***ception: 75

ndler.java:277)

6)

nknown Source)

Source)

known Source)

Help please?

Thanks, RS PS

I also get an error in the client.

Error: Predator size mismatch in getnpcpos - pos:1 psize:0 Error: T2 - 65,81,126 - 0,3251,3285 - Error: T2 - 126,126,126 - 8,3251,3285 - 50,48,47,57,57,10,87,101,

http://pastebin.com/NhhSQbrr

This is what I try pasting or even when I add manually by typing.
